summary.span: 表示文档上单个 XML 节点（可公开事件并可绑定到数据）。

span.span: Represents a single XML node on a document that exposes events and that can be bound to data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当你在设计时将非重复架构元素映射到 Microsoft Office 的 Word 文档时, Visual Studio 将为每个元素创建一个控件, 该控件只允许在文档中出现一次。When you map non-repeating schema elements onto a Microsoft Office Word document at design time, Visual Studio creates an control for each elements that are allowed to appear only once in a document. 非重复架构元素是`maxOccurs`属性设置为1的元素。A non-repeating schema element is an element with the `maxOccurs` attribute set to 1. 只能在设计时在 Word 文档级项目中创建控件。 controls can be created only in Word document-level projects at design time. 它们不能在运行时或在应用程序级项目中创建。They cannot be created at run time or in application-level projects. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[XMLNode 控件](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control)和[如何:向 Word 文档](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-xmlnode-controls-to-word-documents)添加 XMLNode 控件。For more information, see [XMLNode Control](/visualstudio/vsto/xmlnode-control) and [How to: Add XMLNode Controls to Word Documents](/visualstudio/vsto/how-to-add-xmlnode-controls-to-word-documents). [!INCLUDE[vsto_interface](~/includes/vsto-interface-md.md)] ## 用法Usage [!INCLUDE[vsto_net35mref](~/includes/vsto-net35mref-md.md)]

summary.span: 根据附加的一个或多个 XML 架构验证单个 控件。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用带有和属性的方法可根据应用的架构和向用户显示的错误文本来确定 XML 元素是否有效。Use the method with the and properties to determine whether an XML element is valid according to the applied schema and what error text to display to the user. 使用方法可使用自定义验证错误覆盖架构冲突。Use the method to override the schema violations with custom validation errors. 当你运行方法时, Microsoft Office Word 使用具有验证错误的 XML 节点填充集合。When you run the method, Microsoft Office Word populates the collection with the XML nodes that have validation errors. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 使用方法设置的文本值, 并验证节点。The following code example sets the text value of an and validates the node by using the method. 然后, 该示例使用属性来确定节点是否已验证。The example then uses the property to determine whether the node validated. 如果节点未验证, 则该示例使用属性来显示验证错误消息。If the node did not validate, then the example uses the property to display the validation error message. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`CustomerAddress1Node`的。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerAddress1Node`. 如果`CustomerAddress1Node`映射到具有整数数据类型的架构元素, 则验证将失败。If `CustomerAddress1Node` maps to a schema element that has an integer data type, then the validation will fail. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性应与以下参数一起使用。The property is intended to be used with the following parameter. |参数Parameter|说明Description| |---------------|-----------------| |`Advanced`|`true`显示验证错误说明的高级版本, 来自 Microsoft Office Word 随附的 MSXML 5.0 组件;否则为`false`。`true` to display the advanced version of the validation error description, which comes from the MSXML 5.0 component included with Microsoft Office Word; otherwise, `false`.| 如果在不指定参数的情况下使用属性, 它将返回一个不应在代码中直接使用的对象。If you use the property without specifying a parameter, it returns a object that not intended to be used directly from your code. ## 可选参数Optional Parameters 有关可选参数的信息, 请参阅[Office 解决方案中的可选参数](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions)。For information on optional parameters, see [Optional Parameters in Office Solutions](/visualstudio/vsto/optional-parameters-in-office-solutions). ## Examples 下面的代码示例 使用方法设置的文本值, 并验证节点。The following code example sets the text value of an and validates the node by using the method. 然后, 该示例使用属性来确定节点是否已验证。The example then uses the property to determine whether the node validated. 如果节点未验证, 则该示例使用属性来显示验证错误消息。If the node did not validate, then the example uses the property to display the validation error message. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`CustomerAddress1Node`的。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerAddress1Node`. 如果`CustomerAddress1Node`映射到具有整数数据类型的架构元素, 则验证将失败。If `CustomerAddress1Node` maps to a schema element that has an integer data type, then the validation will fail. remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可以是以下值之一: The property can be one of the following values: - 指示此方法用于将属性设置为自定义文本字符串。 indicates that the method was used to set the property to a custom text string. - 指示根据附加架构, XML 元素或属性是有效的。 indicates an XML element or attribute is valid according to the attached schema. 虽然这是属性允许的两个命名常量, 但还有许多来自 Microsoft Office Word 附带的 MSXML 5.0 组件的未命名的值。While these are the only two named constants the property allows, there are many more unnamed values that come from the MSXML 5.0 component included with Microsoft Office Word. ## Examples 下面的代码示例 使用方法设置的文本值, 并验证节点。The following code example sets the text value of an and validates the node by using the method. 然后, 该示例使用属性来确定节点是否已验证。The example then uses the property to determine whether the node validated. 如果节点未验证, 则该示例使用属性来显示验证错误消息。If the node did not validate, then the example uses the property to display the validation error message. 此示例假设当前文档包含一个名为`CustomerAddress1Node`的。This example assumes that the current document contains an named `CustomerAddress1Node`. 如果`CustomerAddress1Node`映射到具有整数数据类型的架构元素, 则验证将失败。If `CustomerAddress1Node` maps to a schema element that has an integer data type, then the validation will fail.
